title: when you have a game that makes you so glad to be in low elo
body: i accidentally went shen even though we already had a top so it was safe to assume bottom pick would go jungle but he derps and goes blitz supp. so i go top with riven and it was kind of the gist that we would lose due to rengar taking every single buff and gaining ridiculous levels but turns out he went afk at level 5 and we won even though nasus was like 5 levels ahead of me due to duo top. lmao the silver cancer is the dream

replies.body: yeah, silver can be pretty funny, especially if you dont pay attention in champ select, you just pick your champ and afk on reddit, then you look back during loading and go WTF is their comp with like poppy jungle and lee sin support. then you get owned by it :(
river shen. if you didnt play it...you didnt deserve the win.
